threat_report_excerpt: The threat actor known as APT-X has been observed using spear-phishing emails with malicious Office documents. The documents contain VBA macros that download a second-stage payload from compromised WordPress sites. Initial indicators include connections to 45.33.32.156 and domains matching the pattern update-service[.]*.com. The malware establishes persistence through scheduled tasks named 'WindowsUpdate' and communicates with C2 servers over HTTPS on port 443.

suspicious_email.subject: URGENT: Your Microsoft 365 password expires in 24 hours
suspicious_email.body:
Dear User,

Your Microsoft 365 password will expire in 24 hours. Click the link below to verify your account and avoid service interruption:

https://microsoft-verify.com/reset?id=abc123

Microsoft Security Team
